price: (Allāhu) sọ pé: “Ọdún mélòó ni ẹ̀yin (aláìgbàgbọ́) lò lórí ilẹ̀ ayé?”
arabic: قَٰلَ كَمۡ لَبِثۡتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ عَدَدَ سِنِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla kam labith'tum fī al-arḍi ʿadada sinīna
